# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Blueprint_database)

INCLUDE(${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMake/PluginMacros.cmake)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Blueprint)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
BlueprintPluginInfo.C
BlueprintCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
BlueprintPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
BlueprintMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtBlueprintFileFormat.C
avtBlueprintDataAdaptor.C
avtBlueprintTreeCache.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
BlueprintEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtBlueprintFileFormat.C
avtBlueprintDataAdaptor.C
avtBlueprintTreeCache.C
avtBlueprintWriter.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${CONDUIT_INCLUDE_DIR}
${MFEM_INCLUDE_DIR}
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTKh_INCLUDE_DIRS}
${VTKM_DIR}/include/vtkm-1.2
${VTKM_DIR}/include/vtkm-1.2/vtkm/thirdparty/taotuple
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${MFEM_LIBRARY_DIR} ${CONDUIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IBlueprintDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IBlueprintDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IBlueprintDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MBlueprintDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MBlueprintDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${CONDUIT_LIB} ${MFEM_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MBlueprintDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MBlueprintDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EBlueprintDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EBlueprintDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser ${CONDUIT_LIB} ${MFEM_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EBlueprintDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EBlueprintDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EBlueprintDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EBlueprintDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par ${CONDUIT_LIB} ${MFEM_LIB} conduit_relay_mpi )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EBlueprintDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EBlueprintDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Blueprint ${INSTALLTARGETS})
